questions.question: In the 1970s, which car became synonymous with the term 'muscle car' and featured prominently in films and popular culture?
What was the iconic feature of the DeLorean DMC-12, made famous in the 1980s 'Back to the Future' movie series?
Which 1990s SUV is often credited with starting the SUV craze in America, becoming a suburban status symbol?
In the 2000s, which car was famously involved in a major global recall due to unintended acceleration issues?
What iconic sports car was reintroduced in the 1980s with a significant design overhaul, making it a symbol of the decade?
Which car was introduced in the 1990s and became synonymous with the rise of Japanese sports cars in the United States?
During the 1980s, which luxury car brand introduced the legendary 'Quattro' all-wheel drive system, revolutionizing performance cars?
Which vehicle was known as the first luxury SUV, gaining popularity in the 1990s?
During the 1980s, which iconic motorcycle model was revived by Harley-Davidson, helping to save the company?
What was a significant advancement in automotive safety introduced in the 1970s?
Which iconic sports car made its debut in 1982, becoming a symbol of 1980s performance and style?
In the 1990s, which minivan became synonymous with suburban family life?
Which car was famously known as the first mass-produced hybrid vehicle, introduced in the late 1990s?
In the early 2000s, which luxury SUV became a status symbol, often associated with celebrities?
Which Japanese car manufacturer introduced the first mass-produced rotary engine car in the 1970s?
